SELECT * FROM MEMBERCOUNT WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(membercount_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(membercount_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(membercount_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(sysdate-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(membercount_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(membercount_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(sysdate-30, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(membercount_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY membercount_date ASC
